snippet: Isabelle Prime and her Yemeni translator were abducted in the capital, Sana, and were freed months later.
abstract: French authorities say Isabelle Prime, Frenchwoman who was abducted in Yemen in February along with her translator Shereen Makawi, has been freed.
lead_paragraph: Isabelle Prime and her Yemeni translator were abducted in the capital, Sana, and were freed months later.

headline.main: France: Woman Abducted in Yemen Has Been Freed
headline.print_headline: Europe; France: Woman Abducted in Yemen Has Been Freed
